steps.title: Draw the basic shape of the grenade (an oval).
steps.content: Draw the basic shape of the grenade (an oval). You can also use a circle or other shapes to make your grenade look unique.

steps.title: Add 5 diagonal curve lines to act as guidelines.
steps.content: Add 5 diagonal curve lines to act as guidelines. Make sure that there is enough space in the top of the oval for the pin later.

steps.title: Add 4 vertical curve lines to act as another guideline.
steps.content: Add 4 vertical curve lines to act as another guideline.

steps.title: Add a square or a rectangle shape at the top of the oval.
steps.content: Add a square or a rectangle shape at the top of the oval.

steps.title: Add another rectangle on the top and a triangle pointing downwards.
steps.content: Add another rectangle on the top and a triangle pointing downwards.

steps.title: Add a circle that will serve as the pin of the grenade.
steps.content: Add a circle that will serve as the pin of the grenade.

steps.title: Follow the guidelines and add the details.
steps.content: Follow the guidelines and add the details. If preferred, ink in your work. Note that the grenade has several curve parts in the side.

steps.title: Erase the stray pencil marks and the unwanted lines.
steps.content: Erase the stray pencil marks and the unwanted lines.

steps.title: Don't forget that a grenade is made up of metal.
steps.content: Don't forget that a grenade is made up of metal. Make it more realistic by adding highlights and shadows.
